titles: Fond loue why dost thou dally: or, The passionate louers ditty in praise of his loue thats faire and witty. To the tune of The mocke widdow.
notes: In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Printer's name and estimated publication date from STC.
Verse - "Fond loue why dost thou dally,".
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
